Or: in which George is the Twitter Description Man, and Dream is the perpetually-trending Minecraft youtuber he has a love-hate relationship with.
notes:
The setup: Dream is a huge Minecraft youtuber known for his “Minecraft but” videos. George is the Twitter employee that has to write brief descriptions for all the trending hashtags (aka the Twitter Description Man). Sapnap is a fellow coworker at Twitter HQ who’s been friends with George for a long time.
